data:
## function_createIntersection
> **createIntersection**(`config`?): `object`

Create an intersection service.

The returned service includes the patch method to set the elements to observe / intersection options and the states to track the visible elements.

### Parameters

• **config?**: [`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`IntersectionProps`](#intersectionprops)\>

the props config for the intersection service

### Returns

`object`

the intersection service

#### elements$

> **elements$**: [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)[]\>

#### patch

> **patch**: (`storesValues`) => `void`

##### Parameters

• **storesValues**: [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`IntersectionProps`](#intersectionprops)\>

##### Returns

`void`

#### visibleElements$

> **visibleElements$**: [`ReadableSignal`](https://amadeusitgroup.github.io/tansu/interfaces/ReadableSignal.html)\<[`Map`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map)\<[`Element`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/Element), [`IntersectionObserverEntry`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/IntersectionObserverEntry)\>\>

## interface_IntersectionProps
Interface representing the properties for the Intersection service.

### Properties

#### elements

> **elements**: [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)[]

elements to observe

***

#### options

> **options**: `undefined` \| [`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<`IntersectionObserverInit`\>

IntersectionObserverInit used in the [IntersectionObserver](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/IntersectionObserver)

##### See

[MDN documentation](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/IntersectionObserver/IntersectionObserver#options)
